titleStmt.title: Nothing without God. These are to give notice unto all persons, that this most renowned and approved Dutch doctor in many nations, was born in that great and famous city and University of Leyden in Holland is now come to this famous city of London ...
titleStmt.author: Gerardts, Gonsale.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
With a large coat of arms with the inscription: "HONI SOIT QVI MAL Y PENSE".
Imperfect: closely cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
